attributes.action: bring in compulsory neutering of all dogs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dogs were breed from wolves to serve humans, but now they are nothing but a dangerous pest with no real use in society. we ask for all dogs to be neutered so that in 15 years time no one will ever have to get killed by a dog again or step in dog foul or be pestered by a smelly wet dog while having a picnic, with the dog owner stood by expect you to be happy about it.
